articles.author: Chris Smith
articles.title: Daring plans to save the boys trapped in that Thai cave are underway – and none of them involve Elon Musk
articles.description: You probably heard about the soccer boys trapped in that Thai cave by now, as the story is all over the news. The boys are as fine as they can be under the circumstances, and authorities say they’r…

articles.title: 18000 barrels of Bourbon at risk after rest of warehouse collapses
articles.description: A Bourbon warehouse owned by Kentucky distiller Barton 1792 containing around 18,000 barrels has completely collapsed, almost two weeks after half of the building came crashing down.

articles.author: Ewan Palmer
articles.title: Video: Texas Teen Attacked for Wearing MAGA Hat
articles.description: Video shows suspect throwing drink in boy’s face at Whataburger restaurant.

articles.author: Grant Smith, Sharon Cho
articles.title: Oil Holds Near $74 as Trump Lambasts OPEC to Temper Price Surge
articles.description: Oil held near $74 a barrel amid estimates that U.S crude inventories declined for a fourth week, compounding concerns that global markets are growing increasingly tight.

articles.author: Georgi Kantchev
articles.title: Global Stocks Rebound as Investors Shrug Off Looming Tariffs
articles.description: Stocks in Europe and U.S. futures bounced back as investors looked beyond a looming deadline for tariffs between the U.S. and China to healthy economic data and a potential de-escalation of some trade tensions.

articles.author: Carla Mozee
articles.title: US offer for 'zero solution' to car tariffs drives EU auto makers higher
From today, bitcoin will not add even a rupee to your bank balance
articles.description: India Business News: NEW DELHI: The Reserve Bank of India's (RBI) deadline to banks to stop any relationship with cryptocurrency exchanges expires on Thursday.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Jaguar says 'bad Brexit' would mean it could not stay in UK
articles.description: Britain's biggest carmaker Jaguar Land Rover said a so-called "hard Brexit" would cost it 1.2 billion pounds a year, curtailing its future operations in the United Kingdom.

articles.author: Brittain Ladd
articles.title: Donald Trump Supporters Vs. Walmart: Lessons Learned From Walmart's Impeach 45 PR Crisis
articles.description: Walmart's recent PR crisis over selling merchandise viewed as being hostile to President Donald Trump is an example of the dangers faced by retailers in the age of 24/7 news and social media.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: ZTE names new CEO, other top executives to comply with US mandate: WSJ
articles.description: China's embattled ZTE Corp  has named a set of new top executives, including CEO and CFO, to comply with its deal with the United States to get a supplier ban lifted, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday.

articles.author: Weizhen Tan
articles.title: Goldman: Commodities are set to rise, trade war fears have been oversold
articles.description: Goldman Sachs said it maintained its "Overweight" assessment of the commodities space, and said it has a 12-month expected return of 10 percent.

articles.title: Chinese tension whips up a new chip super-cycle

articles.author: Catherine Shu
articles.title: California's new online cancellation law benefits many disgruntled subscribers in other places, too
articles.description: A new California law that went into effect on July 1 will make it much easier for people to cancel subscriptions online. Since the bill, sponsored by State Sen. Bob Hertzberg (D-Van Nuys), includes all services that have paying customers in the state, it will…

articles.author: Samantha Pearson
articles.title: Brazilian Police Make Arrests in 'Operation Resonance' Probe
articles.description: Brazilian police have detained Daurio Speranzini Jr., whom prosecutors accuse of taking part in a price-fixing cartel when he worked for Philips Medical Systems, before he joined General Electric.

articles.author: Christopher Carbone
articles.title: Fourth of July holiday gas prices hit 4-year high
articles.description: Gas prices will hit their highest level since 2014 on this Fourth of July, but remain lower than the all-time high for the holiday.

articles.author: Stella Yifan Xie
articles.title: Chairman of Chinese Conglomerate HNA Dies After Accidental Fall From Cliff
articles.description: Wang Jian, the chairman and co-founder of Chinese conglomerate HNA, died after being injured in an accidental fall during a business trip in France.

articles.author: Leada Gore | lgore@al.com
articles.title: Macy's July 4 fireworks show: Time, channel, livestream, how to watch
articles.description: If a trip to New York isn't part of your Fourth of July plans, you can still enjoy the fireworks lighting up the Manhattan skyline this year.

articles.author: Chaim Gartenberg
articles.title: Netflix is testing a new, pricier 'Ultra' subscription tier
articles.description: Netflix is testing a new, “Ultra” subscription tier that could cut features from the company’s existing top “Premium” option

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Blame 'superstar' tech firms for slow wage growth: OECD
articles.description: Fast-growing "superstar" tech firms are taking a growing share of national income in many countries, leaving workers' overall wage growth subdued, the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development said on Wednesday.

articles.title: FAA says: We're a safety agency, not a creature comfort agency
articles.description: Shrinking seats have frustrated travelers, but the FAA says they should take it up with the airlines.
